ValidationRule.description: Inactive End Date must be equal to Claimant Respond Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISNULL( Inactive_End_Date__c )), NOT(ISNULL( Claimant_Respond_Date__c )), Inactive_End_Date__c <> Claimant_Respond_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Inactive End Date must be equal to Claimant Respond Date
